name: Sleepy Sheepies
description:
Sleepy Sheepies is a 2D platformer where you play as Lambo as he tries to save the nation of Hiber from eternal slumber! Use the arrow keys or the buttons on screen to avoid the encroaching nightmare fog until you can find the Sandman's sleep powder! 

This game was created in 3 days and I had to learn nearly everything from the ground up. I created every part of the game except the backgrounds, and this is currently a prototype or early version of the game I intend to publish in 2018.
